name: MAFIA: Sex Noir
description:
Mafia Sex Noir is a visual novel game with Live2D animated sex scenes.
STORY
Set in the 50th, Mafia Sex Noir tells a true uncensored backgroud story abour Guidice family, their business and personal affairs.
Follow Havier and his mafia family on this truly journey!
FEATURES:
- Five chapters of visual novel
- Beautiful animated artwork and scenes
- English, Chinese, Russian text options
- CG Gallery Mode
All characters are over the age of 18
